wordpressPage.title: Contact
wordpressPage.content:

Get in touch

You can contact me by submitting the form below, following me on social media, or by dropping an email at contact@nparchments.com
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_social_media_follow admin_label=”Social Media Follow” link_shape=”rounded_rectangle” background_layout=”light” url_new_window=”off” follow_button=”on”] [et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”facebook” url=”https://www.facebook.com/welcToNabhoneel” skype_action=”call” bg_color=”#3b5998″] facebook [/et_pb_social_media_follow_network][et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”google-plus” url=”https://plus.google.com/u/0/+NabhoneelMajumdar/posts” skype_action=”call” bg_color=”#dd4b39″] Google+ [/et_pb_social_media_follow_network][et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”twitter” url=”https://twitter.com/Nabhoneel” skype_action=”call” bg_color=”#00aced”] Twitter [/et_pb_social_media_follow_network][et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”rss” url=”https://www.nparchments.com/feed” skype_action=”call” bg_color=”#ff8a3c”] RSS [/et_pb_social_media_follow_network][et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”linkedin” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/in/nabhoneel” skype_action=”call” bg_color=”#007bb6″] LinkedIn [/et_pb_social_media_follow_network] [/et_pb_social_media_follow][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″][et_pb_contact_form admin_label=”Contact Form” captcha=”on” email=”contact@nparchments.com” use_redirect=”off” success_message=”Thanks for getting in touch! I’ll get back to you soon.” input_border_radius=”5″ use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” custom_button=”off” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″ title_font_size=”40″ form_field_font_size=”20″] [et_pb_contact_field field_title=”Name” field_type=”input” field_id=”Name” required_mark=”on” fullwidth_field=”off”] [/et_pb_contact_field][et_pb_contact_field field_title=”Email Address” field_type=”email” field_id=”Email” required_mark=”on” fullwidth_field=”off”] [/et_pb_contact_field][et_pb_contact_field field_title=”Message” field_type=”text” field_id=”Message” required_mark=”on”] [/et_pb_contact_field] [/et_pb_contact_form][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
